snippet: Djokovic eased into the third round of the Madrid Open by beating Borna Coric, 6-2, 6-4. Djokovic had four double faults but relied on his return to overpower Coric....
lead_paragraph: Djokovic eased into the third round of the Madrid Open by beating Borna Coric, 6-2, 6-4. Djokovic had four double faults but relied on his return to overpower Coric.
abstract: Novak Djokovic beats Borna Coric in second round at Madrid Open.
